name: You Are What You Consume
description:
This game was made in 5 days by 1 person for the Dani's Basement Game Jam.

It was made entirely in unity with models made in Blender.

Song:

Beauty Flow by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5025-beauty-flow
